item.description:
* UPDATE *

I will be filling in for Devorah as contact for this happy hour. I can be reached at 203-554-5144, but I may be a wee bit late. - Ben
_______________________________________

Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

The Greek Olive
http://www.thegreekol...

They are generously entending their happy hour for us, so their specials will run until 8pm!

$2.50 Drafts
$1 off all drinks

Happy hour buffet

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.name: *UPDATE* The Greek Olive Happy hour!
